Circuit.description: This is the schema definition for an electrical circuit.
Circuit.longDescription: This resource shall be used to represent an electrical circuit for a Redfish implementation.

enumLongDescriptions.AC100To127V: This value shall indicate the device supports a nominal voltage in the complete range of 100-127VAC.  Range values are generally used to describe support on device inputs or inlets.
enumLongDescriptions.AC100To240V: This value shall indicate the device supports a nominal voltage in the complete range of 100-240VAC.  Range values are generally used to describe support on device inputs or inlets.
enumLongDescriptions.AC100To277V: This value shall indicate the device supports a nominal voltage in the complete range of 100-277VAC.  Range values are generally used to describe support on device inputs or inlets.
enumLongDescriptions.AC120V: This value shall indicate the device supports a nominal voltage of 120VAC.  Specific values are generally used to describe support on device outputs or outlets.
enumLongDescriptions.AC200To240V: This value shall indicate the device supports a nominal voltage in the complete range of 200-240VAC.  Range values are generally used to describe support on device inputs or inlets.
enumLongDescriptions.AC200To277V: This value shall indicate the device supports a nominal voltage in the complete range of 200-277VAC.  Range values are generally used to describe support on device inputs or inlets.
enumLongDescriptions.AC208V: This value shall indicate the device supports a nominal voltage of 208VAC.  Specific AC voltage values are generally used to describe support on device outputs or outlets.
enumLongDescriptions.AC230V: This value shall indicate the device supports a nominal voltage of 230AC.  Specific AC voltage values are generally used to describe support on device outputs or outlets.
enumLongDescriptions.AC240AndDC380V: This value shall indicate the device supports a nominal voltage in the complete range of 200-240VAC or a value of 380VDC.  Range values are generally used to describe support on device inputs or inlets.
enumLongDescriptions.AC240V: This value shall indicate the device supports a nominal voltage of 240VAC.  Specific AC voltage values are generally used to describe support on device outputs or outlets.
enumLongDescriptions.AC277AndDC380V: This value shall indicate the device supports a nominal voltage in the complete range of 200-277VAC or a value of 380VDC.  Range values are generally used to describe support on device inputs or inlets.
enumLongDescriptions.AC277V: This value shall indicate the device supports a nominal voltage of 277VAC.  Specific AC high voltage values may be used to describe support on device inputs or outputs.
enumLongDescriptions.AC400V: This value shall indicate the device supports a nominal voltage of 400VAC or 415VAC.  Specific AC high voltage values may be used to describe support on device inputs or outputs.
enumLongDescriptions.AC480V: This value shall indicate the device supports a nominal voltage of 480VAC.  Specific AC high voltage values may be used to describe support on device inputs or outputs.
enumLongDescriptions.DC12V: This value shall indicate the device supports a nominal voltage of 12VDC.
enumLongDescriptions.DC16V: This value shall indicate the device supports a nominal voltage of 16VDC.
enumLongDescriptions.DC1_8V: This value shall indicate the device supports a nominal voltage of 1.8VDC.
enumLongDescriptions.DC240V: This value shall indicate the device supports a nominal voltage of 240VDC.
enumLongDescriptions.DC380V: This value shall indicate the device supports a nominal voltage of 380VDC.
enumLongDescriptions.DC3_3V: This value shall indicate the device supports a nominal voltage of 3.3VDC.
enumLongDescriptions.DC48V: This value shall indicate the device supports a nominal voltage of 48VDC.
enumLongDescriptions.DC5V: This value shall indicate the device supports a nominal voltage of 5VDC.
enumLongDescriptions.DC9V: This value shall indicate the device supports a nominal voltage of 9VDC.
enumLongDescriptions.DCNeg48V: This value shall indicate the device supports a nominal voltage of -48VDC.

enumDescriptions.OneOrTwoPhase3Wire: Single or Two-Phase / 3-Wire (Line1, Line2 or Neutral, Protective Earth).
enumDescriptions.ThreePhase5Wire: Three-phase / 5-Wire (Line1, Line2, Line3, Neutral, Protective Earth).

enumLongDescriptions.OneOrTwoPhase3Wire: This value shall represent a Single or Two-Phase / 3-Wire (Line1, Line2 or Neutral, Protective Earth) wiring.  This value shall be used when both phase configurations are supported.  This is most common where detachable cordsets are used.
enumLongDescriptions.OnePhase3Wire: This value shall represent a Single-phase / 3-Wire (Line1, Neutral, Protective Earth) wiring.
enumLongDescriptions.ThreePhase4Wire: This value shall represent a Three-phase / 4-Wire (Line1, Line2, Line3, Protective Earth) wiring.
enumLongDescriptions.ThreePhase5Wire: This value shall represent a Three-phase / 5-Wire (Line1, Line2, Line3, Neutral, Protective Earth) wiring.
enumLongDescriptions.TwoPhase3Wire: This value shall represent a Two-phase / 3-Wire (Line1, Line2, Protective Earth) wiring.
enumLongDescriptions.TwoPhase4Wire: This value shall represent a Two-phase / 4-Wire (Line1, Line2, Neutral, Protective Earth) wiring.

enumLongDescriptions.California_CS8265: This value shall represent a plug that matches the 'California Standard' CS8265 style plug (Three-phase 250V; 50A; 3P4W).
enumLongDescriptions.California_CS8365: This value shall represent a plug that matches the 'California Standard' CS8365 style plug (Three-phase 250V; 50A; 3P4W).
enumLongDescriptions.Field_208V_3P4W_60A: This value shall represent field-wired input is three-phase 200-250V; 60A; 3P4W.  It is appropriate for use on a 60A branch circuit.
enumLongDescriptions.Field_400V_3P5W_32A: This value shall represent field-wired input is three-phase 200-240/346-415V; 32A; 3P5W.  It is appropriate for use on a 30, 32A, or 40A branch circuit.
enumLongDescriptions.IEC_60309_316P6: This value shall represent a plug that matches the IEC 60309 316P6 plug (Single-phase 200-250V; 16A; 1P3W; Blue, 6-hour).
enumLongDescriptions.IEC_60309_332P6: This value shall represent a plug that matches the IEC 60309 332P6 plug (Single-phase 200-250V; 32A; 1P3W; Blue, 6-hour).
enumLongDescriptions.IEC_60309_363P6: This value shall represent a plug that matches the IEC 60309 363P6 plug (Single-phase 200-250V; 63A; 1P3W; Blue, 6-hour).
enumLongDescriptions.IEC_60309_460P9: This value shall represent a plug that matches the IEC 60309 460P9 plug (Three-phase 200-250V; 60A; 3P4W; Blue; 9-hour).
enumLongDescriptions.IEC_60309_516P6: This value shall represent a plug that matches the IEC 60309 516P6 plug (Three-phase 200-240/346-415V; 16A; 3P5W; Red; 6-hour).
enumLongDescriptions.IEC_60309_532P6: This value shall represent a plug that matches the IEC 60309 plug 532P6 (Three-phase 200-240/346-415V; 32A; 3P5W; Red; 6-hour).
enumLongDescriptions.IEC_60309_560P9: This value shall represent a plug that matches the IEC 60309 plug 560P9 (Three-phase 120-144/208-250V; 60A; 3P5W; Blue; 9-hour).
enumLongDescriptions.IEC_60309_563P6: This value shall represent a plug that matches the IEC 60309 563P6 plug (Three-phase 200-240/346-415V; 63A; 3P5W; Red; 6-hour).
enumLongDescriptions.IEC_60320_C14: This value shall represent a plug that matches the IEC 60320 specified C14 input (Single-phase 250V; 10A; 1P3W).
enumLongDescriptions.IEC_60320_C20: This value shall represent a plug that matches the IEC 60320 specified C20 input (Single-phase 250V; 16A; 1P3W).
enumLongDescriptions.NEMA_5_15P: This value shall represent a plug that matches the NEMA specified 5-15 straight (non-locking) plug (Single-phase 125V; 15A; 1P3W).
enumLongDescriptions.NEMA_5_20P: This value shall represent a plug that matches the NEMA specified 5-20 straight (non-locking) plug that exhibits a T-slot (Single-phase 125V; 20A; 1P3W).
enumLongDescriptions.NEMA_6_15P: This value shall represent a plug that matches the NEMA specified 6-15 straight (non-locking) plug (Single-phase 250V; 15A; 2P3W).
enumLongDescriptions.NEMA_6_20P: This value shall represent a plug that matches the NEMA specified 6-20 straight (non-locking) plug (Single-phase 250V; 20A; 2P3W).
enumLongDescriptions.NEMA_L14_20P: This value shall represent a plug that matches the NEMA specified locking L14-20 plug (Split-phase 125/250V; 20A; 2P4W).
enumLongDescriptions.NEMA_L14_30P: This value shall represent a plug that matches the NEMA specified locking L14-30 plug (Split-phase 125/250V; 30A; 2P4W).
enumLongDescriptions.NEMA_L15_20P: This value shall represent a plug that matches the NEMA specified locking L15-20 plug (Three-phase 250V; 20A; 3P4W).
enumLongDescriptions.NEMA_L15_30P: This value shall represent a plug that matches the NEMA specified locking L15-30 plug (Three-phase 250V; 30A; 3P4W).
enumLongDescriptions.NEMA_L21_20P: This value shall represent a plug that matches the NEMA specified locking L21-20 plug (Three-phase 120/208V; 20A; 3P5W).
enumLongDescriptions.NEMA_L21_30P: This value shall represent a plug that matches the NEMA specified locking L21-30 plug (Three-phase 120/208V; 30A; 3P5W).
enumLongDescriptions.NEMA_L22_20P: This value shall represent a plug that matches the NEMA specified locking L22-20 plug (Three-phase 277/480V; 20A; 3P5W).
enumLongDescriptions.NEMA_L22_30P: This value shall represent a plug that matches the NEMA specified locking L22-30 plug (Three-phase 277/480V; 30A; 3P5W).
enumLongDescriptions.NEMA_L5_15P: This value shall represent a plug that matches the NEMA specified locking L5-15 plug (Single-phase 125V; 15A; 1P3W).
enumLongDescriptions.NEMA_L5_20P: This value shall represent a plug that matches the NEMA specified locking L5-20 plug (Single-phase 125V; 20A; 1P3W).
enumLongDescriptions.NEMA_L5_30P: This value shall represent a plug that matches the NEMA specified locking L5-30 plug (Single-phase 125V; 30A; 1P3W).
enumLongDescriptions.NEMA_L6_15P: This value shall represent a plug that matches the NEMA specified locking L6-15 plug (Single-phase 250V; 15A; 2P3W).
enumLongDescriptions.NEMA_L6_20P: This value shall represent a plug that matches the NEMA specified locking L6-20 plug (Single-phase 250V; 20A; 2P3W).
enumLongDescriptions.NEMA_L6_30P: This value shall represent a plug that matches the NEMA specified locking L6-30 plug (Single-phase 250V; 30A; 2P3W).

PowerRestorePolicyTypes.description: The enumerations of PowerRestorePolicyTypes specify the choice of power state when power is applied.

enumDescriptions.AlwaysOff: Always remain powered off when external power is applied.
enumDescriptions.AlwaysOn: Always power on when external power is applied.
enumDescriptions.LastState: Return to the last power state (on or off) when external power is applied.

enumLongDescriptions.PowerCycle: This value shall indicate the resource will transition to a power off state, then transition to a power on state.  Upon successful completion, the PowerState property, if supported, shall contain the value `On`.

title: #Circuit.Circuit
